akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5723. Exemption Chapter 10 of title 5 shall not apply to the Panel or to an advisory committee established under section 5722 of this title. (Pub. L. 106–450, title II, § 204, Nov. 7, 2000, 114 Stat. 1943; Pub. L. 117–286, § 4(a)(127), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4319.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2022—Pub. L. 117–286 substituted “Chapter 10 of title 5” for “The Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U.S.C. App.)”.
